text: hananimkkeseo uliege myeongha yeo haneul-eseo bul-i naelyeowa samkyeobeo lin jemul-eul uliege gajyeoeul ttaekka ji seonjijaleul midjimalla malhaneun ja issnani illeogalodoe nae ijeon-e mal sseumgwa neohuiga yoguhan geosdeul-eul gaji go seonjijadeul-i osyeoss-eul ttae neohuiga jinsil-ilamyeon wae geudeul-eul salhaehayeossneu nyo
